flawed_nl_solution:
Running the length of a football field 2000 meters in 2 hours is a speed of 2000/2=<<2000/2=10000>>10000 meters per hour.
At the same speed, Amanda will run the length of a 10000-meter track in 10000/10000 = <<10000/10000=1>>1 hours

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000.0, not 10000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
